choices.text:
when I was 6, my sister was half my age. Now I am 80. How old is my sister now? Calculate this step by step.
My apologies for the confusion. Your sister is currently 73 years old(based on her age now). Here's how I calculated it:
1. At age 6, your sister was half your age(3 years older than you).
2. Now, at age 80, your sister is 73 years older(based on her current age).
